perPage.description: How many entries to display on one page (max 25)

tools.name: post_message_activity
tools.description: [Requires Login] Post a new message activity or update an existing one

recipientId.description: The target user to send the message to

isPrivate.description: Set to true if it is a private message

id.description: AniList Activity ID (null to create new, number to update)

id.description: AniList Activity ID (null to create new, number to update)

tools.name: add_list_entry
tools.description: [Requires Login] Add an entry to the authorized user's list

id.description: The AniList ID of the media entry to add
The ID of the list entry

mediaId.description: The ID of the media to add

status.description: The status of the media on the list

score.description: The score given to the media

scoreRaw.description: The raw score in 100 point format

progressVolumes.description: The amount of volumes read (manga only)

repeat.description: Amount of times the media has been repeated

private.description: Whether the entry should be private

hiddenFromStatusLists.description: Whether the entry should be hidden from non-custom lists

customLists.description: Array of custom list names for the media

startedAt.description: When the user started the media

completedAt.description: When the user completed the media

options.description: Values to save with the entry

id.description: The AniList list ID of the entry to edit

tools.name: search_activity
tools.description: Search for activities on AniList

activityID.description: The activity ID to lookup (leave it as undefined for no specific ID)

id.description: The id of the activity

userId.description: The userID of the account with the activity

messengerId.description: The ID of who sent the message

isFollowing.description: [Requires Login] Filter users by who is following the authorized user

hasReplies.description: Filter by which activities have replies

hasRepliesOrTypeText.description: Filter by which activities have replies or text

createdAt.description: The time at which the activity was created

id_not.description: Exclude an activity with the given ID

id_in.description: Include any activities with the given IDs

id_not_in.description: Excludes any activities with the given IDs

userId_not.description: Exclude any activity with the given userID

userId_in.description: Includes any activity with the given userIDs

userId_not_in.description: Exclude any activity with the given userIDs

messengerId_not.description: Exclude any activity with the given message sender ID

messengerId_in.description: Include any activity with the given message sender IDs

messengerId_not_in.description: Exclude any activity with the given message sender IDs

mediaId_not.description: Exclude any activity with the given media ID

mediaId_in.description: Include any activity with the given media IDs

mediaId_not_in.description: Exclude any activity with the given media IDs

type_not.description: Exclude any activity with the same ActivityType

type_in.description: Include any activity with the given ActivityTypes

type_not_in.description: Exclude any activity with the given ActivityTypes

createdAt_greater.description: Include any activity created at the given date or more recent

createdAt_lesser.description: Include any activity created at the given date or less recent

sort.description: Sort the query by the parameters given.

filter.description: Filter object for searching activities (leave it as undefined for no specific filter)

tools.name: search_anime
tools.description: Search for anime with query term and filters

term.description:
Query term for finding anime (leave it as undefined when no query term specified.)
Query term is used for searching with specific word or title in mind.

You SHOULD not include things that can be found in the filter object, such as genre or tag.
Those things should be included in the filter object instead.

To check whether a user requested term should be considered as a query term or a filter term.
It is recommended to use tools like 'get_genres' and 'get_media_tags' first.

id.description: The AniList ID

startDate.description: The start date of the media

endDate.description: The end date of the media

type.description: The type of the media (ANIME or MANGA)

status.description: The current status of the media

episodes.description: The number of episodes in the media

duration.description: The duration of episodes in minutes

chapters.description: The number of chapters in the media

volumes.description: The number of volumes in the media

isAdult.description: If the media is intended for adult audiences

minimumTagRank.description: The minimum tag rank to filter by

onList.description: [Requires Login] Filter by if the media is on the authenticated user's list

licensedBy.description: Filter by media licensed by a specific company

averageScore.description: Filter by the media's average score

source.description: Filter by the media's source type

countryOfOrigin.description: Filter by the country where the media was created (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code)

id_not.description: Filter by media ID not equal to value

id_in.description: Filter by media ID in array

id_not_in.description: Filter by media ID not in array

idMal_not.description: Filter by MyAnimeList ID not equal to value

idMal_in.description: Filter by MyAnimeList ID in array

idMal_not_in.description: Filter by MyAnimeList ID not in array

startDate_greater.description: Filter by start date greater than value (FuzzyDateInt format)

startDate_lesser.description: Filter by start date less than value (FuzzyDateInt format)

startDate_like.description: Filter by start date that matches pattern

endDate_greater.description: Filter by end date greater than value (FuzzyDateInt format)

endDate_lesser.description: Filter by end date less than value (FuzzyDateInt format)

endDate_like.description: Filter by end date that matches pattern

format_in.description: Filter by media format in array

format_not.description: Filter by media format not equal to value

format_not_in.description: Filter by media format not in array

status_in.description: Filter by media status in array

status_not.description: Filter by media status not equal to value

status_not_in.description: Filter by media status not in array

episodes_greater.description: Filter by episode count greater than value

episodes_lesser.description: Filter by episode count less than value

duration_greater.description: Filter by episode duration greater than value

duration_lesser.description: Filter by episode duration less than value

chapters_greater.description: Filter by chapter count greater than value

chapters_lesser.description: Filter by chapter count less than value

volumes_greater.description: Filter by volume count greater than value

volumes_lesser.description: Filter by volume count less than value

genre_not_in.description: Filter by genres not in array

tag_not_in.description: Filter by tags not in array

tagCategory_in.description: Filter by tag categories in array

tagCategory_not_in.description: Filter by tag categories not in array

licensedBy_in.description: Filter by media licensed by companies in array

averageScore_not.description: Filter by average score not equal to value

averageScore_greater.description: Filter by average score greater than value

averageScore_lesser.description: Filter by average score less than value

popularity_not.description: Filter by popularity not equal to value

popularity_greater.description: Filter by popularity greater than value

popularity_lesser.description: Filter by popularity less than value

source_in.description: Filter by source types in array

sort.description: Sort the results by the provided sort options

filter.description:
Filter object for searching anime.
You MUST NOT include "{ "type": "ANIME" }" in the filter object. As it is already included in the API call.
When no sorting method or any filter is specified, you SHOULD use the site default: "{ "sort": ["SEARCH_MATCH"] }".
Otherwise, request is likely to fail or return no results.

displayAdultContent.description: True if the user wants to display adult content

airingNotifications.description: True if the user wants airing notifications

activityMergeTime.description: The minutes between activity for them to be merged together. 0 is Never, Above 2 weeks (20160 mins) is always.

staffNameLanguage.description: The user's preferred way to see staff and characters

animeListOptions.description: The user's options for anime lists

mangaListOptions.description: The user's options for manga lists
